mapper.update: update question set isnotshare=#{isnotshare} where questionid=#{questionid}
mapper.select: SELECT test.*,testpaper.testpapername FROM test,testpaper WHERE test.testpaperid = testpaper.testpaperid
select IFNULL(AVG(score),0) from testuser where testid=#{id}
select count(*) from testuser tu ,testpaper tp where tu.score>tp.passmark and tu.testid=tp.testpaperid and tu.testid=#{id}
select count(*) from testuser tu ,testpaper tp where tu.testid=tp.testpaperid and tu.testid=#{id}

SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(CAST(round(((select count(*) from testuser tu ,testpaper tp where tu.score>tp.passmark and tu.testid=tp.testpaperid and tu.testid=#{id})/( select count(*) from testuser tu ,testpaper tp where tu.testid=tp.testpaperid and tu.testid=#{id}))*100,2) AS CHAR),'%') AS tgl from testuser tu,testpaper tp
select count(*) from testuser tu ,testpaper tp where tu.testid=tp.testpaperid and tu.testtime=0 and tu.testid=#{id}
SELECT test.*,testpaper.testpapername FROM test,testpaper WHERE test.testpaperid = testpaper.testpaperid and testpaper.testpaperid =#{id}

select u.truename,u.jobnumber,u.username,tu.score from testuser tu left join user u on tu.userid=u.userid left join testpaper tp on tu.testid=tp.testpaperid where tu.testid=#{id} and tu.testtime=0 order by tu.score

select u.truename,u.jobnumber,tu.score,tp.follmark,tp.passmark,tp.testpapername from testuser tu left join user u on tu.userid=u.userid left join testpaper tp on tu.testid=tp.testpaperid where u.jobnumber=#{jobnumber} order by tu.score

SELECT DISTINCT u.truename, u.jobnumber, SUM( tu.testtime ) AS testtime, SUM(tu.score>tp.passmark) AS passtime
FROM testuser tu LEFT JOIN USER u ON tu.userid = u.userid LEFT JOIN testpaper tp ON tu.testid = tp.testpaperid ORDER BY tu.score
